post.body: have you take a look @Twitblogs? If you want to see who is enjoying it check out our favourites. Tues will be a big upgrade too!
why do you think Twitblogs is a bust? You seemed happy earlier. Would love your feedback.
too bad must have just missed you. We left at 11:30 ish... It was a good crowd tonight though. Merry Christmas #twitmas style :)
great party. I had a really great time. See you in 2009 :) Merry Christmas.
hey did u hear about the food? Because we r ordering food now otherwise! Help!
thank you. Its been a long day :)
you know I started to try to figure out how to explain what OpenID is, but in 140 char I can't do it. Sorry.
Cool pic. Where was it taken in the world?
yup roger.canada on gtalk. Sorry for the delay.
I heard you are new to Twitter. That's great! Welcome. I would love to chat with you when your free. Happy to call or Skype
were we not going to chat today?
Im going out to the Regal Beagle tonight for some riblets. I LOVE riblets. Apparently the Regal Beagle's are still the best in Calgary #yyc
Very interesting site for those who want to keep their details on the many social networks in sync with one another - http://cli.gs/Lqmd1v
